rooms.description: Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows to allow natural light and enhance connection with the outdoors. Adheres to Vastu principles by facing east or north.
Modern kitchen with ample workspace and integrated appliances. Vastu oriented in the southeast to harness positive energy.
Adjacent dining area with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring ambient lighting. Vastu suggests placement in the northeast.
Main bedroom designed for rest and relaxation with a private balcony overlooking the swimming pool area. Following Vastu guidelines by positioning the head of the bed towards the north.
Secondary bedroom offering a cozy retreat. Placed in accordance with Vastu to ensure balance of energy.
Well-designed bathroom featuring modern fixtures and ample storage. Vastu placement is important; ideally located north or west.

openings.description: Main entrance with floor-to-ceiling glass panels to maximize natural light and open view.
Secondary exit providing direct access to the swimming pool area.

additional_features.description: Outdoor swimming pool placed in the southwest corner for optimal energy flow as per Vastu. Sized appropriately on a 30x40 ft plot.
